description: Creates a launch template. A launch template contains the parameters to launch an instance.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Launch templates can include UserData scripts that execute commands on instance startup, enabling execution of malicious code.
Creating launch templates modifies the cloud compute infrastructure configuration, which can be leveraged to deploy unauthorized instances.
UserData in launch templates can be used to download and execute malicious payloads on instance startup.

incidents.description: GuardDuty Extended Threat Detection uncovers cryptomining campaign on Amazon EC2 and Amazon ECS

securityImplications: Attackers might use CreateLaunchTemplate to define instance configurations with malicious UserData scripts, enabling automated deployment of cryptomining or other malicious workloads at scale.
